## Using Segoe as a WebFont

Download the font from https://aka.ms/SegoeUIVariable 
Link on https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/apps/design/downloads/#fonts

```css
  @font-face {
    font-family: 'Segoe UI Variable Display';
    src:
      local('Segoe UI Variable Display'),
      url('/fonts/SegoeUIVF-all.tff') format('truetype-variations');
    font-variation-settings: 'opsz'36;
    font-weight: 300 700;
    font-style: normal;
  }
```
